About Me

Full-Stack Web Developer with a passion for web technologies. I embrace a mindset of continuous learning by finding new ways to challenge myself every day! Searching for a career opportunity as a Full-Stack Web Developer with up to date skills HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap, React.js, Node.js, Express, Handlebars JS, MySQL, MongoDB and more from George Washington University Coding Bootcamp as well as Software Engineering Experience for more than four years.

My goal is to become professional in the field and gain employment in a progressive organization where my skills and experience will be utilized for individual, group and organizational growth.
